infos.value: I expected no less of the chief of Saiga.
Bringing down this many of Rundall's elite soldiersâ€¦
But now your arrival into Ovis marks the end of Saiga.
But never you worry. We won't kill you...yet.
It seems as though there are movements to unite the two shinobi villages of Gouga and Saiga.
I take your silence to mean the rumors are true.
This should be sufficient proof. I'm sure King Jayden will be most pleased.
I cannot let you leave here alive.
Is that so? I'd like to see you try!
